hero.title: MAGIC
hero.subtitle: Distribute work. Govern value.
hero.description: Three primitives. Infinite services. One governed economy. MAGIC is the operations layer — the platform that turns compliance into commerce and work into value.

cards.title: Coin = Work
cards.text: In the CANONIC economy, every coin is backed by validated work. Not speculation. Not sentiment. Work. You contribute, the system validates, you earn. Value flows from what you build, not what you trade.

quote.rest: Every organization contributes. Every contribution is validated. Every validation earns. The galaxy grows one unit of work at a time.

sections.title: Three Primitives
sections.description: Every service in the galaxy composes from three building blocks. Together they form an autonomous agent.

cards.title: 🧠 INTEL
cards.subtitle: Knowledge
cards.text: What you know. The intelligence layer that reads, validates, and learns. Every service has it — it’s universal.

cards.title: 💬 CHAT
cards.subtitle: Communication
cards.text: What you say. Domain-specific interfaces grounded in evidence. Healthcare, legal, finance — each speaks its own language.

cards.title: 💰 COIN
cards.subtitle: Commerce
cards.text: What you earn. The value layer. Every unit of work validated and compensated. Coin equals work. No speculation.

sections.title: The Services
sections.description: Primitives compose into services. Each combination unlocks new capabilities.

sections.title: The Galaxy
sections.description: Every organization joins the galaxy. Every contribution is validated. Tokenized GPU compute. Clinical services. Crowdsourced knowledge. Any backend, any frontend — all governed by the same protocol.

sections.title: Choose Your Tier
sections.description: Start free. Scale when you’re ready. Every tier earns through work.
sections.axiom: Nonprofits get enterprise for free. That’s not charity. That’s architecture.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.description: Four steps. Zero to governed commerce.

cards.title: Join
cards.text: Bring your organization. MAGIC maps every project, every team, every asset into one governed workspace.

cards.title: Validate
cards.text: Eight questions. Seventy standards. MAGIC scores your work against real compliance frameworks — automatically.

cards.title: Comply
cards.text: Your compliance score grows with every contribution. Full compliance unlocks full commerce. The galaxy rewards real work.

cards.title: Earn
cards.text: Coin equals work. Every validated contribution earns. Distribute compute. Crowdsource knowledge. Build together. Get paid.

sections.title: Learning Communities
sections.description: MAGIC communities learn together, build together, earn together. Every community is governed. Every contribution counts.

cards.title: 🧬 Healthcare
cards.subtitle: Clinical AI
cards.text: Radiologists training models. Oncologists validating protocols. Clinicians building the future of medicine — together.

cards.title: ⚡ Compute
cards.subtitle: Tokenized GPU
cards.text: Contribute compute. Train models. Run inference. Every GPU cycle is validated work. Every cycle earns.

cards.title: 📚 Knowledge
cards.subtitle: Crowdsourced Intelligence
cards.text: Experts annotating data. Teams curating knowledge. Communities teaching machines — and each other.

sections.title: The Marketplace
sections.description: Every governed application, discoverable in one place. Built by communities. Validated by the protocol.

cta.title: Build the Future
cta.description: Join the galaxy. Distribute work. Earn through contribution. It’s MAGIC.
